comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on August 14, 2023, 01:28:51 PMIs this not a lie that if Niger Kandadji Dam Project is done, that water to Nigeria will reduce and not be able to power Kanji dam power plant?I'm not a professor of hydraulics to know if this statement written above is true or false, but one thing I know is that no matter how much the water which flows on river Niger is been reduced, the construction of "Kandadji Dam" can never stop water from flowing entirely. Moreover, apart from the river Niger, Niger is also blessed with "Uranium" a natural resources that can be used to power it's own electricity if cut off by the Nigerian Power Electricity & Distribution Company. Or likely diverse to using Solar for generating electricity, since Niger is characterized by having a hot climate.
